channel.title: Spirit shield glitch
channel.description:
hi my base is delta revision is 317
spirit shields (inv and wield) dont work, except elysian which works perfectly
from original client, all shields work as i tested again, so i copied the INTS in class8 but still doesnt work, i added the models, so i copied the models over from old client, and added them...still the same, and if i copy models of spirit shield from the new client to OLD client it works again in old client
lol its weird and im stuck... any ideas?

item.title: Spirit shield glitch

item.description:
